sense.def: Standard Name: Gōng Yě Cháng According to Shiji:Personal Names: Zǐ Cháng 子長, Cháng 萇, and Zǐ Zhī 子芝 Unger no. 421 ????

Unger no. 254; see Rǎn Qiú 冉求
